Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.Hex
  • public class Hex
extends Object
    Represents a coordinate in a hexagonal grid. This is an immutable type. This is not exactly typical object oriented design, but because this is a type that is typically passed around as a data type it is convenient to make this immutable so getters do not accidentally expose a mutable state. Based on: https://www.redblobgames.com/grids/hexagons/
